name: Peter Farago
biography:
President, Farago + Partners advertising agency.
Previously an art director with Geer, Dubois, where he designed the New York City skyline shopping bag for Barnes & Noble, which had one store at the time, showing books in lieu of skyscrapers.
Developed campaign for the Barnes & Noble chain featuring reproductions of drawings of authors (Shakespeare, Virginia Woolf, Oscar Wilde et al) by illustrator Mark Summers. Designed series featuring living authors.

Source: www.farago.com 1/02
